title: Bamako
summary: Bamako (Bambara: ߓߡߊ߬ߞߐ߬ Bàmakɔ̌, Fula: 𞤄𞤢𞤥𞤢𞤳𞤮 Bamako) is the capital and largest city of Mali, with a 2009 population of 1,810,366 and an estimated 2020 population  of 2.71 million.[8] It is located on the Niger River, near the rapids that divide the upper and middle Niger valleys in the southwestern part of the country.
